p: There have only been two recorded instances of MAYV infection in Venezuela. In 2000, MAYV was identified in a family of four in the Barlovento subregion of the state of Miranda ( 30). The second instance of MAYV was in the village of La Estaci√≥n, where 77 cases were reported, of which 19 of them were confirmed as being seropositive ( 14).
